properties.name: registration.analysis.alert-ttl
properties.description: The time the alert needs to have its recommendation generated. When the deadline is getting close, the recommendation might be generated without waiting for the agents to complete their work.

properties.name: amqp.registration.outgoing.notify-batch-error.exchange-name
properties.description: Exchange name for notify batch error stored event.

properties.name: amqp.registration.outgoing.notify-batch-completed.exchange-name
properties.description: Exchange name for notify batch completed event.
